item.description:
It looks like we can fit up to 40 people. Yay!

 

The date has been agreed upon for Sunday, September 18th in York. (All weekend October dates were already booked). Here are all the details. PLEASE READ CAREFULLY.

 

Meet at the Saco Park & Ride at 3pm

  • Exit 36, Saco

  • Located on Industrial Park Road; after exiting the Turnpike (Interstate 95) take Exit 1, at the end of the ramp take a right.

  • I will be standing outside of my car. My picture is on my profile. Look for all the people congregating together.
  • We will leave the park & ride at 3:15pm on the dot. Do NOT be late.
  • If you choose carpool and are NOT the driver, please provide the driver of the car $1-2 cash to cover tolls & gas.
  • If you do not wish to carpool, please email me so I can provide you with an alternative meeting site in York.

GHOST TOUR COST

Price: $12

PayPal Fee: $0.70

Meetup Fee: $1

TOTAL COST: $13.70

There are NO REFUNDS.

 

All payments are DUE by Wednesday, September 7th, 2011. RSVP's will be closed at 8pm on Wednesday, September 7th. If you have not made payment by that date, your RSVP will be automatically be updated to "No". I am required to put a down payment in, so the sooner you pay, the easier it is. I am required to make the final payment immediately after the payment deadline.

 

DINNER

Dinner is planned for  the Lobster Cove. We will go after the ghost tour. As always, you will be responsible for your own dinner costs. Here is the website so you can check out the menu:

http://www.lobstercoverestaurant.com/documents/LobsterCoveMenu2011.pdf

*Dinner location is subject to change depending on availability*

Restaurant Meetup Policy
Please remember, RSVP yes only if you plan to attend to allow us to make reservations. If you RSVP yes and change your mind on attending, you MUST provide at least 24 hours notice or you will be considered a "No Show". After 2 "no shows" to restaurant meetups, you will no longer be allowed to attend restaurant meetups.
item.name: Ghost Tour & Dinner
